title: Should We Pay Off Our House? (Hour 2)
description:
Dave Ramsey & Dr. John Delony discuss:

Paying off a house with savings,

...or with retirement,

Helping a child,

Buying a house from parents,

Taking a new job with a 401(k) loan.


Support Our Sponsor:

Splash Financial

PODS Moving & Storage
